page.title: 08Changing Times.
page.content: Leintwardine has changed little over the years.The school was built in 1845 then it became a playschool. Now it is a Community Centre.The village library is based there and it will be used for a youth club and other activities. A small street called {Rosemary}has changed a lot.Fifty years ago it was just fields now it's a small estate of bungalows and houses and a lot of old people live there.The main street,{ {Watling Street,}has changed as well. There were more shops then there are now.There was a{cobbler's, a {watchmaker's and a draper's shop.}In other parts of the village there used to be a {baker's a grocers, a {chemist's, a saddler's, a sweet shop {and a biycycle.}Now there are only 4 shops.The population has increased but they have to travel elsewhere for most of their shopping.
